sait.bms.problemdomain

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.bms.problemdomain.Book
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChildrensBook, Cookbook, Paperback, Periodical

    public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the Superclass. Takes arguments from subclasses and save them and performs the functions of various methods.
    Version:
    1.5, June 7, 2020
    Author:
    Hong and Kim
